#labels Phase-Deploy
= FSNET =

= Needs =

===In order to use FSNET, you will have to install :===

 * an application server (like Apache Tomcat)
 * a MySQL Database administration tool (like phpmyadmin)

===Librairies to install in the application server :===

 * javax.persistence_1.0.0.jar
 * mysql-connector-java-x-bin.jar


= How to use FSNET =

 ===Theses explanations are for apache tomcat users :===

 # Download fsnet_d1.zip
 # Create a new database user : username : *fsnet*, password : *fsnet*
 # Create a new database named *fsnet*
 # Copy the _javax.persistence_1.0.0.jar_ and the _mysql-connector-java-x-bin.jar_ in the tomcat/lib directory
 # Unzip the fsnet archive
 # Copy the _fsnet.war_ and _fsadmin.war_ files in the tomcat/webapps
 # Run Tomcat
 # Run the project in your web browser :
       * http://localhost:8080/fsadmin for the administrator
       * http://localhost:8080/fsnet for users
